accommodation.name: Hotel Plaza Athénée
accommodation.description: Iconic luxury palace hotel on Avenue Montaigne with Eiffel Tower views
accommodation.tips: Request a room with Eiffel Tower view and try the afternoon tea at La Galerie

accommodation.name: Le Bristol Paris
accommodation.description: Palace hotel with beautiful garden courtyard in the heart of the 8th arrondissement

location.address: 112 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, 75008 Paris, France

accommodation.tips: Don't miss the rooftop suite experience and the beautiful garden courtyard

activities.name: Private Airport Transfer
activities.description: Luxury private transfer from Charles de Gaulle Airport to hotel
activities.tips: Pre-arrange with hotel concierge for seamless arrival

activities.name: L'Ami Jean
activities.description: Acclaimed bistro serving modern Basque cuisine in a lively atmosphere
activities.tips: Make reservations well in advance; try the rice pudding dessert

activities.name: Louvre Museum Private Tour
activities.description: Skip-the-line private guided tour of the world's largest art museum
activities.tips: Focus on highlights including Mona Lisa, Venus de Milo, and Winged Victory

activities.name: Le Meurice Alain Ducasse
activities.description: Three Michelin-starred restaurant with exquisite French haute cuisine
activities.tips: Book the chef's table experience; dress code strictly enforced

activities.name: Pierre Hermé Macarons
activities.description: World-famous patisserie for the finest macarons and pastries
activities.tips: Try the Ispahan (rose, raspberry, lychee) macaron - their signature creation

activities.name: Private Versailles Tour
activities.description: Full-day private tour of Palace of Versailles with skip-the-line access
activities.tips: Include the Trianon palaces and Marie Antoinette's estate in your visit

activities.name: La Tour d'Argent
activities.description: Historic restaurant with Seine views, famous for pressed duck and wine cellar

location.address: 15 Quai de la Tournelle, 75005 Paris, France

activities.tips: Request a table by the window for Notre-Dame views; try their famous pressed duck

activities.name: Breakfast at Café de Flore
activities.description: Historic café in Saint-Germain, once frequented by famous writers and artists
activities.tips: Sit on the terrace for prime people-watching; order the classic French breakfast

activities.name: Musée d'Orsay
activities.description: World's finest collection of Impressionist masterpieces in a beautiful former railway station

location.address: 1 Rue de la Légion d'Honneur, 75007 Paris, France

activities.tips: Don't miss works by Monet, Renoir, and Van Gogh on the upper floor

activities.name: Avenue Montaigne Shopping
activities.description: Luxury shopping on one of the world's most prestigious fashion streets
activities.tips: Visit Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton flagship stores; personal shopping services available

activities.name: Le Cinq
activities.description: Three Michelin-starred restaurant at Four Seasons Hotel George V
activities.tips: Experience Chef Christian Le Squer's innovative cuisine; wine pairing highly recommended

activities.name: Eiffel Tower Private Access
activities.description: Skip-the-line access to all levels of the Eiffel Tower with private guide

location.address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

activities.tips: Visit early morning for fewer crowds; bring a camera for spectacular city views

activities.name: Seine River Luxury Cruise
activities.description: Private luxury yacht cruise along the Seine with champagne and canapés

location.address: Port de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris, France

activities.tips: Perfect for seeing Paris landmarks from the water; very romantic at sunset

activities.name: L'Astrance
activities.description: Three Michelin-starred restaurant offering innovative fusion cuisine
activities.tips: Chef Pascal Barbot's unique French-Asian fusion; reservation essential months ahead

activities.name: Opera Garnier Evening Tour
activities.description: Private evening tour of the magnificent Palais Garnier opera house
activities.tips: Marvel at the Chagall ceiling and the grand staircase; check for evening performances

activities.name: Sainte-Chapelle
activities.description: Gothic chapel famous for its stunning stained glass windows
activities.tips: Visit on a sunny day to see the stained glass at its most spectacular

activities.name: Le Grand Véfour
activities.description: Historic two Michelin-starred restaurant in the Palais Royal gardens
activities.tips: Dine where Napoleon and Victor Hugo once ate; beautiful 18th-century decor

activities.name: Private Airport Transfer
activities.description: Luxury private transfer to Charles de Gaulle Airport for departure
activities.tips: Allow extra time for luxury shopping at airport duty-free

tips: Make restaurant reservations 2-3 months in advance for Michelin-starred establishments
Learn basic French phrases - locals appreciate the effort
Pack comfortable walking shoes as Paris is best explored on foot
Purchase a museum pass for skip-the-line access to major attractions
Tip 10-15% at restaurants only if service charge isn't included
